author: TV Guide
title: Evil Has Returned to Sleepy Hollow in This Sneak Peek of the Premiere
text: Evil Has Returned to Sleepy Hollow in This Sneak Peek of the Premiere When Sleepy Hollowreturns on Thursday, it's up to Ichabod (... Comment Posted Oct. 1, 2015 at 11:10 AM Updated at 2:03 PM Posted Oct. 1, 2015 at 11:10 AM Updated at 2:03 PM Â» Social News When Sleepy Hollow returns on Thursday, it's up to Ichabod ( Tom Mison ) to convince Abbie ( Nicole Beharie ) that evil has returned to town. And when Ichabod tags along to a crime scene, he immediately suspects a supernatural force was behind the deaths and sets out to prove his theory with the help of some dragon's breath he picked up on his travels. "Something you picked up in duty free?" Abbie jokes. But neither of them are laughing after what happens next. Check it out in the exclusive sneak peek above. Sleepy Hollow airs Thursdays at 9/8c on Fox. Other Links From TVGuide.com
